other_tests.findings: Hypercellular marrow without evidence of marrow replacement by a malignant process or underproduction of blood elements.
Normal absolute numbers of CD3+, CD4+, and CD8+ T cells; 13% of CD3+ T cells were double-negative T cells.
Heterozygous for a germline FAS receptor mutation in intron 4, resulting in abnormal gene splicing.
Transient improvement in platelet count with a drop in hemoglobin levels post-administration.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Although effective in the short term, the improvement in platelet count was transient.

other_tests.findings: Positive at 1:40 dilution, negative at 1:80 and 1:160 dilutions (normal, negative at 1:40 and 1:160 dilutions).
